content: i modified a pattern by liat gat of knit freedom fingering-weight for the purpose of teaching toe-up on magic loop with worsted weight for beginners her pattern is here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/beginner-toe-up-socks-for-magic-loop here are links to youtube videos for the cast-on options link 1 for turkish cast-on link 2 for judy s magic cast-on 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=qyz119fe-uc 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=1pmxrdz-cwo&index=2&list=flx21383izrpjkfq_1l-xc2w
